full_description:
\n
\n
Business Systems Analyst
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Corporate Headquarters
\n
12575 Uline Drive, Pleasant Prairie, WI 53158
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Our people are our greatest asset! As a Business Systems Analyst, you’ll serve as IT and analytical liaison to Uline’s Finance team, helping to ensure they’re equipped to make the best business decisions to support our growing company!
\n
\n
Careers Packed with Potential.
Backed by 45+ years of success, Uline offers opportunities to grow your career with stability you can count on.
\n
\n
Position Responsibilities
\n
\n
\n
Manage daily technology processes for the department, developing identified process improvements, automation and efficiencies.
\n
Investigate, analyze and resolve user issues.
\n
Maintain and test various department system software to ensure correct setup.
\n
Collaborate with various business functions to ensure project requirements are met.
\n
\n
\n
Minimum Requirements
\n
\n
Bachelor's degree. Major in Finance or Business
a plus.
\n
1+ years of experience in SQL and VBA. Working knowledge of Power BI
preferred.
\n
Experience in business-to-business (B2B) environment is
an asset.
\n
Excellent communication, analytical and organizational skills.
\n
\n
\n
Benefits
\n
\n
Complete health insurance coverage and 401(k) with 6% employer match that starts day one!
\n
Multiple bonus programs.
\n
Paid holidays and generous paid time off.
\n
Tuition Assistance Program that covers professional continuing education.
\n
\n
\n
Employee Perks
\n
\n
On-site café and first-class fitness center with complimentary personal trainers.
\n
Over four miles of beautifully maintained walking trails.
\n
\n
\n
About Uline
\n
\n
Uline, a family-owned company, is North America’s leading distributor of shipping, industrial, and packaging materials with over 9,000 employees across 14 locations.
\n
\n
Uline is a drug-free workplace. All new hires must complete a pre-employment hair follicle drug screening. All positions are on-site.
\n
\n
EEO/AA Employer/Vet/Disabled

\n

\n

\n
Our employees make the difference and we are committed to offering exceptional benefits and perks! Explore https://www.uline.jobs/#working-here_blankUline.jobs to learn more!
\n
